text: Allāhu ṣe Kaaba, Ilé Haram, ní àyè ààbò fún àwọn ènìyàn. (N̄ǹkan ààbò náà ni) àwọn oṣù ọ̀wọ̀, àwọn ẹran ọrẹ (tí wọn kò ṣàmì sí lọ́rùn) àti (àwọn ẹran ọrẹ) tí wọ́n ṣàmì sí lọ́rùn. Ìyẹn rí bẹ́ẹ̀ kí ẹ lè mọ̀ pé dájúdájú Allāhu mọ ohunkóhun t’ó wà nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ohunkóhun t’ó wà nínú ilẹ̀. Àti pé dájúdájú Allāhu ni Onímọ̀ nípa gbogbo n̄ǹkan
